products.name: New Short Sleeve T-Shirt
products.description: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique, limited edition t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last - only 200 of these shirts will be made! All proceeds will be donated to charity.
products.descriptionMd: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique,¬†**limited edition**¬†t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last - only 200 of these shirts will be made!¬†**All proceeds will be donated to charity.**
products.descriptionHtml: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique, limited edition t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last - only 200 of these shirts will be made! All proceeds will be donated to charity.

reviews.title: OMG!!! BEST SHIRT EVER!!!
reviews.content:
I am **LITERALLY OBSESSED** with this shirt!!! The design is absolutely STUNNING and the quality is UNBELIEVABLE!!! I love the unique triangle design and the fact that it's a limited edition shirt makes it even more special. The fact that proceeds are going to charity is just the cherry on top!!!

I was so excited when I saw that the shirt was available for purchase at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. I immediately placed my order and it arrived in record time! The packaging was so cute and even included a personal, handwritten note which made me feel like a valued customer.

I have received so many compliments on this shirt and I have recommended it to all of my friends and family!!! I will definitely be buying more shirts from this store in the future!!! üòçüòçüòç
reviews.author: Jenna K

reviews.title: Can't say enough good things
reviews.content:
I was really pleased with the overall shopping experience. My order even included a little personal, handwritten note, which delighted me!

The product quality is amazing, it looks and feel even better than I had anticipated. Brilliant stuff! I would gladly recommend this store to my friends. And, now that I think of it... I actually have, many times!
reviews.author: Risako M

reviews.title: The perfect gift for a tech-savvy partner
reviews.content: I bought this shirt as a gift for my tech-savvy partner and they absolutely loved it! The triangle design is unique and eye-catching, and the fit and comfort of the shirt is perfect. The quality of the material is also great. I highly recommend this shirt as a gift for anyone who loves Next.js and Vercel.
reviews.author: Paula B

reviews.title: 20% more performant!
reviews.content: I bought this shirt and I swear, since I've been wearing it, everything around me has become 20% more performant. I can't explain it, but I'm not complaining. The triangle design is unique and I love that it is a limited edition. The fit is perfect and the shirt is comfortable to wear. I also appreciate the fact that all proceeds go to charity. I definitely recommend this shirt to anyone looking to boost their performance.
reviews.author: Benjamin L

reviews.title: Bring on the baby sizes!
reviews.content: I love this shirt and I wish I could buy it in a baby size for my little one. The triangle design is unique and I love that it is a limited edition. The fit is perfect and the shirt is comfortable to wear. I also appreciate the fact that all proceeds go to charity. The only downside is that the material is a bit thin but still it's worth buying. It would be great if they bring on baby sizes too!
reviews.author: David H

reviews.title: Meh, it's okay
reviews.content: The shirt itself is fine, but I wasn't blown away by the design. I also wish the shirt was made out of a softer material. It's not bad, but it's not great either.
reviews.author: Jane S

reviews.title: Geekin' out over this shirt
reviews.content: I absolutely love this shirt! The triangle design is so unique and cool. I also love that all proceeds go to charity. My only complaint is that I wish the shirt was a little more fitted, but that's just my personal preference.
reviews.author: Mike T

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.content: I was really disappointed with this shirt. I thought the triangle design would be cooler, but it just looked like a bunch of pointy shapes to me. Plus, the shirt seemed a little too thin and flimsy for my liking. Not worth the $25, in my opinion.
reviews.author: John D

reviews.title: Triangle-tally awesome!
reviews.content: I am absolutely in love with this shirt! The design is so unique and the quality of the shirt is top-notch. Plus, the fact that all proceeds go to charity makes me feel good about my purchase. I will definitely be buying more shirts from this store.
reviews.author: Sara K
